Package graphComponents

Class Graph<Vertex>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphComponents.Graph<Vertex>
  • Type Parameters:
    Vertex - Type to be used for vertices in the graph
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraph<Vertex>
    public class Graph<Vertex>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraph<Vertex>
    Implementation of an undirected, weighted graph.
